# isObject

> Test if a value is an object.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isObject = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-object' );
```

#### isObject( value )

Tests if a `value` is an `object`.

``` javascript
var bool = isObject( {} );
// returns true

bool = isObject( true );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="notes">

## Notes

* The function returns `false` if provided an `array` or `null`.

  ``` javascript
  var bool = isObject( [] );
  // returns false

  bool = isObject( null );
  // returns false
  ```

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isObject = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-object' );

var bool = isObject( {} );
// returns true

bool = isObject( new Date() );
// returns true

bool = isObject( /.*/ );
// returns true

bool = isObject( null );
// returns false

bool = isObject( [] );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
